Package popt4jlib.LIP

package contains parallel implementations of some well-known algorithms for Linear Integer Programming, including Balas' Additive Algorithm (dating back to an Operations Research article of 1965).

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdditiveSolver2
    class implements a multi-threaded version of Balas' ADDITIVE algorithm for Linear Integer Programming.
    AdditiveSolver2.Node
    auxiliary inner class holding nodes in the Branch-and-Bound Tree of the algorithm.
    AdditiveSolver2.ON
    alternative to using java.util.LinkedList<Node> (which is a doubly-linked list implementation of list).
    AdditiveSolver3
    subclass of the AdditiveSolver2 class, that performs variable branching selection by choosing the free variable with the highest absolute value for its cost-coefficient.
    AdditiveSolverDepr Deprecated 
    AdditiveSolverDepr.Node  
    AdditiveSolverDepr.ON  
    AddSlvrFac
    AdditiveSolver2 factory class, creating objects of type AdditiveSolver3.
    IntArray1Test  

Package popt4jlib.LIP Description

package contains parallel implementations of some well-known algorithms for Linear Integer Programming, including Balas' Additive Algorithm (dating back to an Operations Research article of 1965).

Package Specification

A parallel (multi-threaded) version of a number of optimization algorithms for Linear Integer Programming.
